title: The new section of the cross county trail being installed near Wade Park has newly installed sidewalks on Bethel Road.  I thought the plan was for the new trail to be wide asphalt so bikes could travel on them?  Bikes are not allowed on sidewalks.  Are they installing sidewalks all the way down Waltmoor Road also? Why are some areas sidewalks and others asphalt?
